parameters.name: page.offset
parameters.description:
可选, 开始位置, 取值:>=0, 0为第一条, 默认值为0. 作为输出时,
返回本次请求返回的第一条记录实际位置(一般与输入一致).
[EN] Optional, start position, value: > = 0, 0 is the first line; the default value is 0.
In response, actual offset of the first returned record is returned
(generally equals to the offset in request).

parameters.name: page.limit
parameters.description:
长度, 默认取值范围[1,100], 如果超出范围, 则返回失败; 在某些接口中limit范围可能会重新定义, 请以其接口的补充说明为准.
[EN] Length, default value range [1,100], if it is out of the range, error will be returned; as the limit range may be redefined in some APIs, please refer to the supplementary description of these APIs.

parameters.name: page.total
parameters.description:
可选, 请求无须填此参数, 响应时系统填写.
[EN] Optional, this parameter is not required for request, but will be
filled in response.

get.summary: 查询任务信息状态请求.

CrowdConfigCrowdOutputMode.description:
人群全景图,密度图和滞留图的输出模式类型 [DEPRECATED].
[EN] Types of output mode of panoramic, crowd density maps and crowd strand maps [DEPRECATED].

 - OutputOnAlarm: 告警时输出.
[EN] Output when alarm.
 - OutputOff: 一直不输出.
[EN]Never output.
 - OutputForever: 一直输出.
[EN] Output always.

head_y.description:
头部Y坐标, 大小[0,1].
[EN] The y coordinate of head. range [0,1].

foot_y.description:
脚部Y坐标, 大小[0,1].
[EN] The y coordinate of foot. range [0,1].

CrowdConfigV2LabelPerson.description:
人体标签, 用于标定人体身高在画面中的相对坐标.
[EN] The person label, mark the relative person's height.

roi.description:
人群聚集事件分析的ROI配置 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Crowd congregate analyze ROI [SINCE v3.2.0].

cnt_thresh.description:
人群聚集行人个数阈值, 必须大于0 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Number threshold of crowd gathering pedestrians must be greater than 0 [SINCE v3.2.0].

time_thresh.description:
人群聚集时间阈值, 必须大于0, 单位为秒 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] The time threshold of congregate in seconds must be greater than 0, unit: second [SINCE v3.2.0].

distance_thresh.description:
人与人之间的距离, 必须大于0, 单位为米 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] The distance threshold of distance between people, must be greater than 0, ut is meter [SINCE v3.2.0].

turn_scatter_on.description:
开启人群分散处理 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] turn scatter on [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdEventRuleCongregateRule.description:
人群聚集/分散分析配置 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Crowd Congregate/Scatter  config [SINCE v3.2.0].

line_margin.description:
可选, 跨线线两端延长margin, 单位像素. 若不填时, 值为30px [EXPERIMENTAL].
[EN] Optional, extend the margin at both ends of the cross-over line, ut is px. If 'line_margin' is not filled, 'line_margin' will equal 30px [EXPERIMENTAL].

p_roi_margin.description:
可选, 正方向至少跨过线margin像素后才记录为跨线, 单位像素. 若不填或者填0, line_margin会取值400px [EXPERIMENTAL].
[EN] Optional, the positive direction at least crosses line margin pixels before it is recorded as a cross line, ut is px.
If 'p_roi_margin' is not filled or equals 0, 'p_roi_margin' will equal the default value 30px [EXPERIMENTAL].

n_roi_margin.description:
可选, 反方向至少跨过线margin像素后才记录为跨线, 单位像素. 若不填或者填0, line_margin会取值100px [EXPERIMENTAL].
[EN] Optional, the opposite direction at least crosses line margin pixels before it is recorded as a cross line, ut is px
If 'n_roi_margin' is not filled or equals 0, 'n_roi_margin' will equal the default value 100px [EXPERIMENTAL].

line_neighbor_margin.description:
可选, 跨线周边之间的margin. 若不填或者填0, line_neighbor_margin会取默认值50px [EXPERIMENTAL].
[EN] Optional, cross line neighbor margin. If 'line_neighbor_margin' is not filled or equals 0, 'line_neighbor_margin' will equal the default value 50px [EXPERIMENTAL].

cross_line.description:
跨线坐标, 必须传入两个点表示参考线, 建议参考线尽量穿过画面中部区域, 以达到更好的检测效果 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Cross-line coordinate, 2 points must be introduced to represent the reference line.
It is suggested that the reference line should pass through the middle area of the image as far as possible to achieve a better detection effect [SINCE v3.2.0].

directions.description:
跨线主方向(主方向对应出, 反方向对应进). 必须传入两个点分别表示起始点和终止点 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Cross line main direction(Main direction indicate out, opposite direction indicate in).2 points must be introduced to represent the start point and the end point [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdEventRuleCrossLineRule.description:
人群跨线分析配置 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Crowd cross line config [SINCE v3.2.0].

roi.description:
可选, 人群密度分析ROI配置, ROI区域越大, 算法相对精度越高, 建议设置ROI区域面积占画面1/4以上, ROI太小则不能保证精度. 默认值为全屏 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Optional, ROI areas of crowd density, It is suggested to set the ROI area to take up more than 1/4q of the screen, and the accuracy cannot be guaranteed if the ROI is too small. default value is full screen [SINCE v3.2.0].

crowd_thresh.description:
人群过密告警人数阈值, 必须大于0 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Number threshold of roi area for overcrowding alarm, must larger than 0 [SINCE v3.2.0].

time_thresh_second.description:
时间阈值, 单位为秒 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] The time threshold of event in seconds, unit: second [SINCE v3.2.0].

min_output_interval_second.description:
最小输出时间间隔, 单位为秒, 当内部分析间隔可能高于此值时, 输出事件间隔设置为分析间隔 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] The event output interval time in seconds, unit: second, when internal analysis interval is large than this, min_output_interval_second will set to internal analysis interval [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdEventRuleDensityRule.description:
人群过密分析事件规则 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Crowd social distance config [SINCE v3.2.0].

roi.description:
可选, 分析ROI, 默认是全屏 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Optional, analysis ROI, default value is full screen [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdEventRuleHeadTargetRule.description:
人群人头分析规则 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] crowd head target rule [SINCE v3.2.0].

roi.description:
可选, 事件分析ROI, 默认是全屏 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Optional, ROI areas of event analysis, default value is full screen [SINCE v3.2.0].

participant_count_thresh.description:
事件参与人员人数阈值, 默认值为1 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Number threshold of event participant, default value is 1 [SINCE v3.2.0].

time_thresh_second.description:
时间阈值, 单位为秒 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] The time threshold of event in seconds, unit: second [SINCE v3.2.0].

min_output_interval_second.description:
最小输出时间间隔, 单位为秒, 当内部分析间隔可能高于此值时, 输出事件间隔设置为分析间隔 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] The event output interval time in seconds, unit: second, when internal analysis interval is large than this, min_output_interval_second will set to internal analysis interval [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdEventRuleIntrusionRule.description:
人群入侵事件规则 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] crowd intrusion event rule [SINCE v3.2.0].

roi.description:
人群逆行事件分析的ROI配置 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Crowd retrograde analyze ROI [SINCE v3.2.0].

directions.description:
逆行主方向. 必须传入两个点分别表示起始点和终止点 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Main direction of retrograde event.2 points must be introduced to represent the start point and the end point [SINCE v3.2.0].

participant_count_thresh.description:
事件参与人员人数阈值, 默认值为1 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Number threshold of event participant, default value is 1 [SINCE v3.2.0].

min_output_interval_second.description:
最小输出时间间隔, 单位为秒, 当内部分析间隔可能高于此值时, 输出事件间隔设置为分析间隔 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] The event output interval time in seconds, unit: second, when internal analysis interval is large than this, min_output_interval_second will set to internal analysis interval [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdEventRuleRetrogradeRule.description:
人群逆行事件分析配置 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Crowd retrograde config [SINCE v3.2.0].

polygon.description:
可选, ROI多边形区域. 默认值为全屏 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Optional, ROI polygon. default is full screen [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdEventRuleRoiConfig.description:
事件分析ROI配置 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] The ROI Config of general crowd event [SINCE v3.2.0].

roi.description:
人群社交距离分析的ROI配置 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Crowd congregate analyze ROI [SINCE v3.2.0].

close_distance_threshold.description:
相距过近阈值, 单位米, 必须大于0 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] distance too close threshold. unit: meter, must large than 0 [SINCE v3.2.0].

close_pair_threshold.description:
人数对阈值, 必须大于0 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] the number of people threshold, must large than 0 [SINCE v3.2.0].

close_time_threshold.description:
持续时间时间阈值, 单位秒 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] the duration threshold. unit: second [SINCE v3.2.0].

min_output_interval_second.description:
最小输出时间间隔, 单位为秒, 当内部分析间隔可能高于此值时, 输出事件间隔设置为分析间隔 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] The event output interval time in seconds, unit: second, when internal analysis interval is large than this, min_output_interval_second will set to internal analysis interval [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdEventRuleSocialDistanceRule.description:
人群社交距离分析配置 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Crowd social distance config [SINCE v3.2.0].

roi.description:
可选, 分析ROI, 默认是全屏 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Optional, analysis ROI, default value is full screen [SINCE v3.2.0].

strand_thresh.description:
滞留时间的阈值,必须大于0, 单位秒. [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] The time threshold of strand. unit: second [SINCE v3.2.0].

min_output_interval_second.description:
最小输出时间间隔, 单位为秒, 当内部分析间隔可能高于此值时, 输出事件间隔设置为分析间隔 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] The event output interval time in seconds, unit: second, when internal analysis interval is large than this, min_output_interval_second will set to internal analysis interval [SINCE v3.2.0].

participant_count_thresh.description:
事件参与人员人数阈值, 默认值为1 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Number threshold of event participant, default value is 1 [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdEventRuleStrandAnalyzeRule.description:
人群滞留分析规则 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] crowd head target rule [SINCE v3.2.0].

enable.description:
是否开启. [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] enable or not, default value is false [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdRealtimeAnalysisConfigDensityMapCon.description:
实时密度图分析 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] realtime density map analysis [SINCE v3.2.0].

enable.description:
是否开启. [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] enable or not, default value is false [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdRealtimeAnalysisConfigHeadTargetCon.description:
人头点实时分析 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Head target realtime analysis. [SINCE v3.2.0].

enable.description:
是否关闭实时分析结果的输出 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] disable crowd realtime analysis output, default value is false [SINCE v3.2.0].

min_interval.description:
输出间隔时间, 服务可能因为性能原因放大此参数, 单位为ms [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] output interval, service may enlarge this argument for performance reason, unit: ms [SINCE v3.2.0].

CrowdRealtimeAnalysisConfigRealtimeAnaly.description:
人群实时分析结果通用输出配置 [SINCE v3.2.0].
[EN] Common configuration of crowd realtime analysis output mode [SINCE v3.2.0].

vertices.description:
多边形顶点.
注意: 坐标点为[0.0, 1.0]之间的任意浮点数, 表示相对宽或高的位置.
注意: 仅包含两个顶点, 目标区域被解释为矩形, 第一个为左上角坐标, 第二个为右下角坐标.
[EN] Polygon vertices.
Note: The coordinate point can be any floating point between [0.0, 1.0], indicating a relatively wide or high position.
Note: when vertices only contains two vertices, the polygon is interoperate as rectangular, the first is the coordinate
in upper left corner and the second is in the lower right corner.

commonapisBoundingPolyF.description:
多边形, 可用于表示ROI [SINCE v2.0.0].
[EN] Polygon, can be used to represent ROI [SINCE v2.0.0].

region_id.description:
摄像头所属区域id, 0号id系统保留, 范围: [1, 16383].
[EN] Region id of the camera, in which id '0' is reserved by the system, range: [1, 16383].

camera_idx.description:
摄像头在区域region_id内的下标, 0号id系统保留, 范围: [1, 127].
[EN] Camera index in region specified by region_id, in which id '0' is reserved by the system, range: [1, 127].

commonapisCameraIdentifier.description:
系统摄像头唯一标识, 一般由业务系统统一分配和管理.
[EN] The unique id of the system camera, is generally distributed and managed by the service system.

camera_id.description:
可选, 摄像机ID. 摄像机的UUID, 对应相机管理服务的camera_uuid.
[EN] Optional, camera ID. UUID of camera is corresponding to camera_uuid in camera management.

device_type.description:
可选, 内部自动生成, 为commonapis.ingress.SourceType对应字符串.
[EN] Optional, it is generated automatically as a string corresponding to commonapis.ingress.SourceType.

place_code.description:
可选, 摄像头所在区域代码 [DEPRECATED].
[EN] Optional, zone code of the camera [DEPRECATED].

place_name.description:
可选, 摄像头所在区域名 [DEPRECATED].
[EN] Optional, zone code of the camera [DEPRECATED].

tollgate_id.description:
可选, 摄像头所在卡口代码 [DEPRECATED].
[EN] Optional, tollgate code of the camera [DEPRECATED].

tollgate_name.description:
可选, 摄像头所在卡口名 [DEPRECATED].
[EN] Optional, tollgate name of the camera [DEPRECATED].

internal_id.description:
摄像头内部唯一标识.
[EN] Unique identification of internal camera.

zone_id.description:
可选, Zone的UUID, 对应相机管理服务的zone_uuid [SINCE v2.0.0].
[EN] Optional, UUID of Zone is corresponding to zone_uuid in camera management. [SINCEv2.0.0].

commonapisCameraInfo.description:
摄像机通用信息.
[EN] Camera information.

rule_id.description:
可选, 规则ID (注: 如下发任务时未指定则自动生成).
[EN] Optional, rule ID (note: automatically generated if unspecified when creating tasks).

duration.description:
可选, 时长, 事件的时长告警阈值. json中是字符串类型, 例如填写5s表示5秒.
- 此参数用于逗留事件、徘徊事件及违停事件, 其和Worker配置文件中的min_duration共同起作用，只有同时大于这两者时，才会上报告警事件, 如果不配或置空，则只使用min_duration配置. 其他事件不需要此参数, 不填或置空即可.
[EN] Optional, duration, event time interval threshold. json is a string type. For example, filling 5s means 5 seconds.
- It is used for pedestrian stay, pedestrian hover and vehicle park events, and works together with min_duration parameter in worker config file, only exceed these two parameters at same time, the worker will report corresponding event, min_duration alone in worker config is used if this paramter is not filled or blank. Other events do not need it, leave it bland or not filled.

direction.description:
可选, 方向. 用于跨线事件. 此为非范化向量坐标(图像坐标系), 例如(-1,0)表示左, (1,0)表示右, (0,-1)表示上, (0,1)表示下, (1,1)表示右下, (0,0)表示不限定方向. 不填或置空表示业务不要求方向.
[EN] Optional, direction. Used for cross-line events. This is a non-normalized vectorial coordinate (image coordinate system). For example (-1,0) means left, (1,0) means right, (0,-1) means upward side, (0,1) means lower side, (1,1) means lower right, (0,0) means unlimited direction. Blank indicates the task has no direction limitation.

commonapisEventRule.description:
VIPER平台事件任务规则 [SINCE v2.0.0] [DEPRECATED].
[EN] VIPER event rule [SINCE v2.0.0] [DEPRECATED].

commonapisEventType.description:
VIPER平台支持系统预定义事件规则类型 [SINCE v2.0.0].
[EN] VIPER system pre-defined event types. [SINCE v2.0.0].

 - EVENT_UNKNOWN: unknown. 未知.
[EN] unknown.
 - EVENT_PEDESTRIAN_STAY: pedestrian stay event. 逗留事件.
[EN] pedestrian stay event.
 - EVENT_PEDESTRIAN_HOVER: pedestrian hover event. 可疑人员徘徊事件.
[EN] pedestrian hover event.
 - EVENT_PEDESTRIAN_CROSS_LINE: pedestrian cross line event. 越线事件.
[EN] pedestrian cross line event.
 - EVENT_PEDESTRIAN_INVADE: pedestrian invade event. 区域入侵事件.
[EN] pedestrian invade event.
 - EVENT_VEHICLE_PARK: vehicle park event. 违停事件.
[EN] vehicle park event.

latitude.description:
纬度, 单位是度. 取值范围 [-90.0, +90.0].
[EN] The latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

longitude.description:
经度, 单位是度. 取值范围 [-180.0, +180.0].
[EN] The longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0].

commonapisJSONPBAny.description:
动态JSONPB Schema支持, 对应的JSON表示形式为:
`{"@jsonpb_type": "sensetime.com/viper.algo.xx", "key1": "value1"}` [SINCE v2.3.0].
[EN] Dynamic JSONPB Schema support, JSON representation for this type is:
`{"@jsonpb_type": "sensetime.com/viper.algo.xx", "key1": "value1"}` [SINCE v2.3.0].

commonapisObjectType.description:
VIPER平台支持物体对象类型.
ObjectType与字符串表示的标准映射如下见对应枚举项注释.
[EN] VIPER object types.
The standard mapping between ObjectType and string representations is shown in the corresponding enumerations in the items below.

 - OBJECT_UNKNOWN: unknown. 未知.
[EN] unknown.
 - OBJECT_FACE: face. 人脸. 输入和输出类型, 输入类型用于创建任务时的枚举, 输出类型用于输出数据对象的枚举.
[EN] face. Input and output types; input type is used for enumeration when creating tasks, while output type is used for enumeration when outputting data objects.
 - OBJECT_PEDESTRIAN: pedestrian. 人体. 仅为输出类型 [SINCE v1.4.0].
[EN] pedestrian. pedestrian and other human body. Output type only [SINCE v1.4.0].
 - OBJECT_AUTOMOBILE: automobile. 机动车. 仅为输出类型 [SINCE v1.4.0].
[EN] automobile. Output type only [SINCE v1.4.0].
 - OBJECT_CYCLIST: cyclist. 骑手, 对象框包含非机动车和人. 仅为输出类型 [SINCE v1.4.0].
[EN] cyclist. cyclist, target frame include human powered vehicle and human body. Output type only [SINCE v1.4.0].
 - OBJECT_HUMAN_POWERED_VEHICLE: human_powered_vehicle. 非机动车. 仅为输出类型 [SINCE v1.4.0].
[EN] human_powered_vehicle. Non-motor vehicle. Output type only [SINCE v1.4.0].
 - OBJECT_SCENARIO: scenario. 场景识别. 仅为输出类型 [SINCE v2.0.0].
[EN] scenario. Scene recognition. Output type only [SINCE v2.0.0].
 - OBJECT_CROWD: crowd. 人群识别. 输入和输出类型 [SINCE v2.0.0].
[EN] crowd. Crowd recognition. Both input and output types [SINCE v2.0.0].
 - OBJECT_ALGO: algo. 算法仓. 输入和输出类型 [SINCE v2.3.0].
[EN] algo. Algo store object. Both input and output types [SINCE v2.3.0].
 - OBJECT_SNAPSHOT: snapshot. 抓拍. 仅为输入类型 [SINCE v3.1.0].
[EN] snapshot. snapshot image from video. Input type only [SINCE v3.1.0].
 - OBJECT_FACE_EXTEND_PEDESTRIAN: face_extend_pedestrian. 人脸人体特殊场景，人体从场景图提取. 仅为输入类型 [SINCE v3.1.0].
[EN] face_extend_pedestrian. face and pedestrian special scenario,  pedestrian image from panoramic image. Input type only [SINCE v3.1.0].
 - OBJECT_EVENT: event. 事件. 仅为输出类型 [SINCE v3.1.0].
[EN] event. OutPut type only [SINCE v3.1.0].
 - OBJECT_VIDEO_SOURCE_DIAGNOSIS: video_source_diagnosis. 视频源诊断, 对视频解码图像的质量诊断. 仅为输出类型 [EXPERIMENTAL].
[EN] video_source_diagnosis. quality diagnosis for decoded frame from video. Output type only [EXPERIMENTAL].
 - OBJECT_AUTOMOBILE_DETECT: automobile_detect. 大图强制检测机动车场景，iis仅保留大图，封装成ted，ips检测出大图内的最大的N个车以及车内人脸，为输出类型 [SINCE v4.0.0].
[EN] automobile_detect. big image forces to detect the automobile scene, iis only keeps big image and pack it into ted, 
ips detects the largest N cars and faces in big image. Output type only [SINCE v4.0.0].
 - OBJECT_MULTI_PACH: pedestrian+automobile+cyclist+human_powered_vehicle. 仅为输入类型 [SINCE v1.4.0].
[EN] pedestrian+automobile+cyclist+human_powered_vehicle. Input type only [SINCE v1.4.0].
 - OBJECT_SCENARIO_CITY_MANAGEMENT: city management scenario. 城管类场景. 仅为输入类型 [SINCE v2.0.0].
[EN] city management scenario. Input type only [SINCE v2.0.0].
 - OBJECT_FACE_PEDESTRIAN: face+pedestrian. 人脸人体联合pipeline. 仅为输入类型 [SINCE v2.1.0].
[EN] face+pedestrian. Face and pedestrian association pipeline. Input type only [SINCE v2.1.0].
 - OBJECT_SCENARIO_AUTOMOBILE_THROW: city management scenario - automobile throw. 城管类场景-车辆抛撒. 仅作为输入类型 [EXPERIMENTAL].
[EN] city management scenario - automobile throw. autiombile throwing pipeline. Input type only [EXPERIMENTAL].
 - OBJECT_MULTI_FACE_PACH: face+pedestrian+automobile+cyclist+human_powered_vehicle. 仅为输入类型 [SINCE v2.2.0].
[EN] face+pedestrian+automobile+cyclist+human_powered_vehicle. Input type only [SINCE v2.2.0].
 - OBJECT_TRAFFIC_AUTOMOBILE_COUNT: traffic automobile count. 交通车辆计数. 仅为输入类型 [INTERNAL] [EXPERIMENTAL].
[EN] traffic automobile count. Input type only [INTERNAL] [EXPERIMENTAL].
 - OBJECT_TRAFFIC_MULTI_PACH: pedestrian+automobile+cyclist+human_powered_vehicle. 仅为输入类型 [INTERNAL] [EXPERIMENTAL].
[EN] pedestrian+automobile+cyclist+human_powered_vehicle. Input type only [INTERNAL] [EXPERIMENTAL].
 - OBJECT_HUMAN_ACTION: city management - human action. 城管类应用-行人动作识别，仅作为输入类型 [SINCE v3.0.0].
[EN]  city management - human action. Input type only [SINCE v3.0.0].
 - OBJECT_TRAFFIC_ANOMALY_EVENT: Traffic anomaly event. 交通异常事件. 仅为输入类型 [INTERNAL] [EXPERIMENTAL].
[EN] Traffic anomaly event. Input type only [INTERNAL] [EXPERIMENTAL].
 - OBJECT_TRAFFIC_CAMERA_VISION_INFO: Traffic camera vision information. 交通场景相机视觉信息. 输入和输出类型 [INTERNAL] [EXPERIMENTAL].
[EN] Traffic camera vision information. Both input and output types [INTERNAL] [EXPERIMENTAL].

command_type.description:
命令类型: Play (实时流播放), Playback (回放), Download(下载).
[EN] Command types: Play(real-time stream playing), Playback(playback)， Download(download).

start_time.description:
录像回放/录像下载开始时间, Playback/Download时必选，RFC 3339格式; Play时无效.
[EN] Start time of Playback/Download, required for Playback/Download, in RFC3339 format; invalid for Play.

stop_time.description:
录像回放/录像下载结束时间, Playback/Download时必选，RFC 3339格式; Play时无效.
[EN] End time of Playback/Download, required for Playback/Download, in RFC3339 format; invalid for Play.

speed.description:
录像回放/录像下载速度，是否支持视第三方平台情况. Playback/Download时可选; Play时无效.
Playback时，取值[1/4, 1/2, 1, 2, 4]为正放倍速，取值[-1/4, -1/2, -1, -2, -4]为倒放倍速。默认为1，正常回放.
Download时，取正整数，一般为1,2,4,8，表示下载倍速，实际取值范围需依赖第三方平台能力。默认为1，不加速.
[EN] Playback/Download speed, supported or not depends on the situation of the third-party platform. Optional for Playback/Download; invalid for Play.
When the command_type is Playback, the value [1/4, 1/2, 1, 2, 4] is the positive speed, and the value [-1/4,-1/2,-1,-2,-4] is the reverse speed. The default value is 1, normal playback.
When the command_type is Download, this value takes a positive integer, generally 1,2,4,8, which indicates the download speed. The actual value range depends on the capabilities of the third-party platform. The default value is 1, which does not accelerate.

raw_config.description:

[EN] Optional, valid for GB28181 camera.

接入源参数 -- 大华视频云平台 [SINCE v4.0.0].

host.description:
更多信息见产品文档.
host地址, 目前只支持ipv4和ipv6, 暂不支持域名. 此参数不可为空.
[EN] Refer to product documentation for more information.
Host address only supports ipv4 and ipv6 currently, it does not support domain names. This parameter shall not be empty.

port.description:
端口号, 取值: [1~65536). 接入源为ftp类型或主动模式类型时不可为空; 接入源为其他类型时可为空(默认).
[EN] Port number, value: [1 ~ 65536). Cannot be empty when the ingress source type is ftp type or active mode type; when the ingress source type is  another type, it can be empty (default).

user.description:
用户名. 接入源为ftp类型时不可为空; 接入源为其他类型时可为空(默认), 主动模式类型视对方相机设置而定.
[EN]  User name. It cannot be empty when the ingress source type is ftp type; when the ingress source type is other types, it can be empty (default), and the active mode type depends on the camera settings of the opposite side.

password.description:
密码. 接入源为ftp类型时不可为空; 接入源为其他类型时可为空(默认), 主动模式类型视对方相机设置而定.
[EN] Password. It cannot be empty when the ingress source type is ftp type; when the ingress source type is other types, it can be empty (default), and the active mode type depends on the camera settings of the opposite side.

dir.description:
接入源根目录. 接入源为ftp类型时不可为空; 其他类型时此字段无效, 可为空(默认).
[EN] Ingress source root directory. It cannot be empty when the ingress source type is ftp type; when the ingress source type is other types, this field is invalid and can be empty (default).

ipc.description:

[EN] Camera Subscribe ID number. The ingress source type of xinghuo platform cannot be empty; when the ingress source type is other types, this field is invalid and can be empty (default).

parental.description:

[EN] When it is device, it is required to select whether there is subdevice. 1:Yes, 0:No.

parent_id.description:
父设备/区域/系统ID.
[EN] Parent device/region/system ID.

safety_way.description:
可选, 信令安全模式. 缺省为0, 0:不采用; 2:S/MIME签名方式; 3:S/MIME加密签名同时采用方式; 4:数字摘要方式.
[EN] Optional, signaling security mode. Default to 0, 0: not used; 2:S/MIME signature method; 3:S/MIME encryption and signature method adopted at the same time; 4. Digital digest method.

register_way.description:
注册方式, 缺省为1; 1:符合IETF RFC 3261标准的认证注册模式; 2:基于口令的双向认证注册模式; 3:基于数字证书的双向认证注册模式.
[EN] Register way, default to 1; 1: Authentication registration mode conforming to IETFRFC3261 standard; 2: Two-way authentication registration mode based on password; 3: Two-way authentication registration mode based on digital certificate.

cert_num.description:
证书序列号, 有证书的设备必选.
[EN] Certificate serial number, required for the device with certificate.

certifiable.description:
证书有效标识, 有证书的设备必选. 缺省为0, 证书有效标识: 0:无效; 1:有效.
[EN] Valid identification of certificate, required for the device with certificate. Default to 0, valid identification of certificate: 0: Invalid; 1: Valid.

err_code.description:
无效原因码, 有证书且证书无效的设备必选.
[EN] Invalid error code, required for the device with invalid certificate.

end_time.description:
证书终止有效期, 有证书的设备必选.
[EN] The validity period of the certificate, required for the device with the certificate.

secrecy.description:
保密属性. 缺省为0, 0:不涉密; 1:涉密.
[EN] Security attribute. Default to 0, 0: not classified; 1: classified.

ip_address.description:
可选, 设备/区域/系统IP地址.
[EN] Optional, device/region/system IP address.

port.description:
可选, 设备/区域/系统端口.
[EN] Optional, device/region/system port.

password.description:
可选, 设备口令.
[EN] Optional, device password.

status.description:
设备状态, 作为返回值时必选.
[EN] Device status, required as return value.

geo_point.description:
可选, 相机经纬度坐标.
[EN] Optional, coordinates of latitude and longitude of camera.

ingressGB28181Item.description:
GB28181设备目录项类型 [SINCE v1.3.0].
[EN] GB28181 device catalog item type [SINCE v1.3.0].

ptz_type.description:
摄像机类型扩展, 标识摄像机类型: 1-球机; 2-半球; 3-固定枪机; 4-遥控枪机. 当目录项为摄像机时可选.
[EN] Camera type expansion, identify camera type: 1-Ballhead camera; 2-Dome camera; 3-Fixed-gun-type camera; 4-Remote-control-gun-type camera. Optional when the catalog item is camera.

position_type.description:
摄像机位置类型扩展. 1-省际检查站; 2-党政机关; 3-车站码头; 4-中心广场; 5-体育馆; 6-商业中心; 7-宗教场所; 8-校园周边; 9-治安复杂区域; 10-交通干线. 当目录项为摄像机时可选.
[EN] Camera position type expansion. 1-Provincial checkpoints; 2-Party and government organizations; 3-Station terminal; 4-Central plaza; 5-Gymnasiums; 6-Commercial Centers; 7-Religious sites; 8-Surroundings of the campus; 9-Regions with various public security issues; 10-Artery traffic. Optional when the catalog item is camera.

room_type.description:
摄像机安装位置室外/室内属性. 1-室外; 2-室内. 当目录项为摄像机时可选.
[EN] Outdoor/indoor attributes of camera installation position. 1-Outdoor; 2-Indoor. Optional when the catalog item is camera.

use_type.description:
摄像机用途属性. 1-治安; 2-交通; 3-重点. 当目录项为摄像机时可选.
[EN] Attributes of camera usage. 1-Public security; 2-Transportation; 3-Key point. Optional when the catalog item is camera.

supply_light_type.description:
摄像机补光属性. 1-无补光; 2-红外补光; 3-白光补光. 当目录项为摄像机时可选.
[EN] Camera light supplementary attributes. 1-No light supplement; 2-Infrared supplementary light; 3-White light supplement. Optional when the catalog item is camera.

direction_type.description:
摄像机监视方向属性. 1-东; 2-西; 3-南; 4-北; 5-东南; 6-东北; 7-西南; 8-西北. 当目录项为摄像机时且为固定摄像机或设置看守位摄像机时可选.
[EN] Monitoring Camera Direction Attribute. 1-East; 2-West; 3-South; 4-North; 5-Southeast; 6-Northeast; 7-Southwest; 8-Northwest. Optional when the catalog item is camera and it is a fixed camera or a camera with a guard position.

resolution.description:
摄像机支持的分辨率, 可有多个分辨率值, 各个取值间以“/”分隔. 分辨率取值参见GB28181附录F中SDP-f字段规定. 当目录项为摄像机时可选.
[EN] The camera supports multiple resolutions, with “/” separating each value. The resolution value is specified in SDP-f field in Appendix F of GB28181. It is optional when the catalog item is  camera.

business_group_id.description:
可选, 虚拟组织所属的业务分组ID, 业务分组根据特定的业务需求制定, 一个业务分组包含一组特定的虚拟组织.
[EN] Optional, the service group ID to which the virtual organization belongs. The service group is formulated according to specific service requirements. A service group contains a specific group of virtual organizations.

download_speed.description:
可选, 下载倍速范围, 各可选参数以“/”分隔, 如设备支持1,2,4倍速下载则应写为“1/2/4”.
[EN] Optional, download speed range, each optional parameter is separated by “/”. If the device supports 1,2,4 times speed download, it shall be written as “ 1/2/4”.

svc_space_support_mode.description:
可选, 空域编码能力, 取值0:不支持: 1:1级增强(1个增强层); 2:2级增强(2个增强层); 3:3级增强(3个增强层).
[EN] Optional, spatial coding capability, value 0: not supported: 1: 1 level enhancement (1 enhancement layer); 2:2 level enhancement (2 enhancement layers); Level 3: 3 enhancement (3 enhancement layers).

svc_time_support_mode.description:

 - VPS_TASK_OK: 正常状态.
[EN] Normal status.
 - VPS_TASK_SOURCE_ERROR: 视频接入源异常.
[EN] Video sources error.
 - VPS_TASK_INTERNAL_ERROR: 内部异常.
[EN] Internal error.
 - VPS_TASK_FINISHED: 处理结束.
[EN] Finish status.
 - VPS_TASK_DECODER_ERROR: 解码器异常.
[EN] Decoder error.
 - VPS_TASK_CREATING: 任务创建状态, 是PENDING和OK状态的中间过渡状态 [SINCE v2.0.0].
[EN] Task creation status, which is between PENDING and OK status [SINCE v2.0.0].
 - VPS_TASK_RESOLUTION_ERROR: 视频任务分辨率参数错误 [SINCE v2.1.0].
[EN] Resolution parameter error for video task [SINCE v2.1.0].
 - IIS_TASK_UNKNOWN: 状态未知.
[EN] Unknown status.
 - IIS_TASK_CONNECTED: 正常连接.
[EN] Connected.
 - IIS_TASK_DISCONNECTED: 连接断开.
[EN] Disconnected.
 - IIS_TASK_CONNECTING: 连接中(异步).
[EN] Connecting (Asynchronous).
 - IIS_TASK_PLAY_OVER: 播放结束.
[EN] Play finished.
 - IIS_TASK_REQUEST_DUPLICATE: 参数重复, 接入源已连接.
[EN] Parameters repeat, ingress source connected.
 - IIS_TASK_INACTIVE: 正常连接, 但长时间(默认:超过30分钟)未收到数据.
[EN] Connected, but no data received for a long time (default: more than 30 minutes).
 - MCS_TASK_ERROR: MCS任务错误
 - UNKNOWN_TASK_ERROR: 未知错误
 - TASK_OK: 任务正常

video_processAlgoConfig.description:
算法仓任务配置 [SINCE v3.0.0].
[EN] Algo task config.

roi.title:
人群密度单ROI分析, 推荐使用density_rules字段, 至少3个点. ROI区域越大, 算法相对精度越高, 建议设置ROI区域面积占画面1/4q以上, ROI太小则不能保证精度. ROI区域不设置, 默认为全屏, 此字段将在v3.3删除, 删除后人群过密分析将默认关闭 [DEPRECATED].
[EN] Single ROI area of crowd density, at least 3 points. The larger the ROI area is, the higher the relative accuracy of the algorithm will be.
It is suggested to set the ROI area to take up more than 1/4q of the screen, and the accuracy cannot be guaranteed if the ROI is too small.
The ROI area is not set and is set to full screen by default, this field will be delete in v3.3, after deletion, over density event analysis will be disable by default [DEPRECATED]

scene_area.description:
人群过密告警ROI区域面积, 推荐使用density_rules字段, scene_area若不填或者填0, 人群过密人数阈值使用total_crowd_thresh, 此字段将在v3.3删除, 删除后人群过密分析将默认关闭 [DEPRECATED].
[EN] ROI area for overcrowding alarm. if 'scene_area' is not filled or equals 0, person count threshold will use value of total_crowd_thresh, this field will be delete in v3.3, after deletion, over density event analysis will be disable by default [DEPRECATED].

crowd_thresh.description:
人群过密告警单位面积人数阈值, 推荐使用density_rules字段, crowd_thresh若不填或者填0, 人群过密人数阈值使用total_crowd_thresh 此字段将在v3.3删除, 删除后人群过密分析将默认关闭 [DEPRECATED].
[EN] Number threshold of unit area for overcrowding alarm. if 'crowd_thresh' is not filled or equals 0, person count threshold will use value of total_crowd_thresh. this field will be delete in v3.3, after deletion, over density event analysis will be disable by default [DEPRECATED].

enable_density_map.description:
可选, 默认值为false. 为false时, 密度图不输出, 为true时, 密度图输出模式CrowdOutputMode与全景图一致 此字段将在v3.3删除, 删除后人群过密分析将默认关闭 [DEPRECATED].
注意: 当值为'OutputOnAlarm', 密度图只会在告警状态为Start时输出.
[EN] Optional, the default value is false.When the value is false, the density map does not output. When the value is true, the output mode 'CrowdOutputMode' of the density map is the same as that of the panorama
Note: When the value is 'OutputOnAlarm', the density map will only be output when the alarm status is Start. this field will be delete in v3.3, after deletion, over density event analysis will be disable by default [DEPRECATED].

panoramic_mode.description:
可选, 默认值为'OutputOnAlarm'. 全景图输出模式. 告警时输出全景图的意思为只要存在密度告警或者滞留告警, 都会输出全景图 [DEPRECATED].
注意: 当值为'OutputOnAlarm', 全景图只会在告警状态为Start时输出
[EN] Optional, the default value is 'OutputOnAlarm'. Output mode of panoramic [DEPRECATED].
Panorama outputs when alarming means that as long as there is a density alarm or a strand alarm, the panorama will be output.
Note: When the value is 'OutputOnAlarm', the panorama will only be output when the alarm status is Start.

enable_strand_analyze.description:
是否开启滞留分析 [DEPRECATED].
[EN] Whether to do strand analysis [DEPRECATED].

strand_roi.description:
可选, 人群滞留告警区域, 每个ROI至少3个点, 不设置表示全屏. 当前版本仅支持一个ROI [DEPRECATED].
[EN] Optional, ROI areas of crowd strand, at least 3 points per ROI [SINCE v2.2.0].
When strand_roi is not setted, strand_roi will be setted to full screen by default.
Current version supports only one ROI.

labeled_person.description:
可选, enable_strand_analyze=true时必填, 否则会终止当前任务并提示错误 'strand is enabled, but the LabeledPerson is nil' [DEPRECATED].
人体目标头部与脚Y坐标的标定,做滞留分析时需要使用, 至少3个点. 一般由四个标定的点组成,每个点的X值是视频画面中的人物头部Y坐标,每个点的Y值是人物脚部Y坐标.若标定的点的数量越多,则滞留分析越准确.
注意:若视频画面有变化,如摄像头位置变化,摄像头角度变化,摄像头焦距变化,labeled_person均需要重新标定.
[EN] Optional, when 'enable_strand_analyze' equals true, must be filled [DEPRECATED].
If labeled_person is not filled when 'enable_strand_analyze' equals true,the current task will be terminated and the error prompt is 'strand is enabled, but the LabeledPerson is nil'.
Mark of Y coordinates of human head and foot, at least 3 points. Generally, 'labeled_person' are composed of four mark points.
The X value of each point is the Y coordinate of human head in the video picture, and the Y value of each point is the Y coordinate of human foot.
The more the number of mark points, the more accurate the strand analysis will be.
Note: If the video picture changes, such as camera position, camera angle, camera focus, 'labeled_person' needs to be re-marked.

strand_thresh.description:
滞留时间的阈值,必须大于0，单位秒 [DEPRECATED].
注意: enable_strand_analyze=true时, strand_thresh若不填或者填0, strand_thresh会取默认值10000.
[EN] The time threshold of strand in sesconds must be greater than 0 [DEPRECATED].
Note: when 'enable_strand_analyze' equals true, if 'strand_thresh' is not filled or equals 0, 'strand_thresh' will equal the default value 10000.

enable_strand_map.description:
可选, 默认值为false. 为false时, 滞留图不输出, 为true时, 滞留图输出模式CrowdOutputMode与全景图一致 [SINCE v2.2.0] [DEPRECATED].
注意: 滞留图只落盘Kafka.
注意: 当值为'OutputOnAlarm', 滞留图只会在告警状态为Start时输出.
[EN] Optional, the default value is false.When the value is false, the strand map does not output. When the value is true, the output mode 'CrowdOutputMode' of the strand map is the same as that of the panorama [SINCE v2.2.0] [DEPRECATED].
Note: Strand map is only stored on Kafka.
Note: When the value is 'OutputOnAlarm', strand map will only be output when the alarm status is Start.

crowd_config.description:
人群配置实时分析配置, 任务object_type为OBJECT_CROWD有效, 此字段废弃, 推荐使用 "crowd_v2" 字段 [DEPRECATED].
当object_type为OBJECT_CROWD且crowd_config为空时, 人群ROI为全屏检测, 过密告警阈值较高, 一般不会触发.
[EN] Optional, crowd configuration, which can be filled in when object_type is OBJECT_ CROWD, this field is deprecated, you are recommended to use "crowd_v2" [DEPRECATED].
[EN] When object_type is OBJECT_CROWD and crowd_config is empty, crowd ROI is full-screen, and overcrowding alarm threshold is very high, which will not be triggered most of the time.
